1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that:The Prophet entered upon her, and a freed slave girl of hers concealed herself. The Prophet asked: "Have her periods begun?" She said: "Yes." He tore a piece of his turban and said: "Cover your head with this

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا حَاضَتِ الْجَارِيَةُ لَمْ تُصَلِّ إِلاَّ بِخِمَارٍ
chapter.eng-name: If a girl has menstruated, she should not pray unless she is wearing a head cover
